data.meta_description: Recommended Zhangjiakou itenerary of 8 days to experience the best of this unforgettable city. Top attractions, hotels, restaurants are included in the itinerary. Plan a perfect trip at ease with Trip.com.
data.text:
Day 1

Wanlong Ski Resort

Opening Hours: Open from 10/23-5/4,8:30am-4:30pm

Ticket Price: 280 RMB

Recommended Length of Stay: 1-2 Days

Location: Honghualiang, Chongli County, Zhangjiakou City

Reviews from Real Guests:

Trip.com User: The snow quality is very good, the service is very good, the cable car is very fast, the snow quality is very good, the service is very good, the cable car is very fast, the snow quality is very good, the service is very good, the cable car is very fast

Robert: Not bad overall. The facilities are quite new so everything is nice, but the snow is a bit dissapointing. Restaurant is ok for both lunch and dinner, and the rental equipment looked pretty good, although be prepared to wait a bit.

Day 2 | Morning

Thaiwoo Ski Resort

Opening Hours: Open on Sat-Sun,8:30am-5:00pm;Open on Mon-Fri,8:30am-4:30pm

Ticket Price: 295 RMB

Recommended Length of Stay: 6-8 Hours

Location: Yingcha Village, Chongli County, Zhangjiakou City

Thaiwoo Ski Resort is located 2160 meters above sea level in Chongli County, Hebei Province. The resort has an elevation difference of 510 meters. Thaiwoo Ski Resort was designed by a team of Canadian designers using imported ski lifts and ski machines from France, the U.S., and Italy. The resort features a children's playground with slides, cartoon figures, and a mushroom-shaped house.

Reviews from Real Guests:

Trip.com User: I visited Thaiwoo for a quick weekend getaway in mis-April and had a great time. the Element hotel was wonderful, and the gondola lift was running all the way to the top of the mountain (it actually takes 2 lifts to reach the summit) where they had a nice outdoor area to enjoy the melting ice and snow. The Brew Pub Brewery at the base of the gondola was the real star - fantastic beer and great food, and a surprising list of drinks and friendly people. their train map shows a SJU run near the Great Wall (!!!) so, in addition to the multitude of snow machines, I can’t wait to ski here during the winter. Lots of construction there right now and I can’t wait to visit again once everything is finished.

Lawrence: Thaiwoo Ski Resort is recommended for visitor who like to enjoy the ski session in more exclusively.. there is ample of activity to be done on the ski resort.. I think it's one of the best ski resort in China, and it's near beijing too.. cool place

Day 2 | Evening

If you want to explore other popular attractions later, Holiday Inn Express Zhangjiakou Park View is a suitable place for you to stay and refresh.

Holiday Inn Express Zhangjiakou Park View

The Holiday Inn Express Zhangjiakou Park View is an ideal spot for travelers wanting to discover the city. The Holiday Inn Express Zhangjiakou Park View offers a pleasant stay in Zhangjiakou for those traveling for business or leisure.

The hotel is conveniently located just 9km from Zhangjiakou Railway Station and 11km from Zhangjiakou Airport. Famous local attractions Chaha'er Martyrs' Cemetery, 勝利公園 and 老火車步行街, can all be reached with a short walk.

This hotel makes a great place to kick back and relax after a long day of sightseeing. For those driving themselves, parking is provided on site.

There's never a dull moment at this hotel, our guests indicate that the facilities are excellent. For guests traveling on business, this hotel is consistently one of the most popular choices.

Day 3 | Evening

Looking for a bed nearby after finishing your journey at Fulong Ski Resort? YUN-ZEN JINLING CUIYUNSHAN HOTEL CHONGLI is one of your top choices.

YUN-ZEN JINLING CUIYUNSHAN HOTEL CHONGLI

The YUN-ZEN JINLING CUIYUNSHAN HOTEL CHONGLI is a great choice for guests looking for accommodation in Zhangjiakou, having been recently opened in 2020.

The hotel is only 2km from Chongli Railway Station and 57km from Zhangjiakou Airport, giving guests a number of convenient transportation options. Seeing Zhangjiakou's sights from this hotel is easy with Cuiyunshan Yinhe Ski Field, Bingxue Culture Museum and 西灣子天主教堂 all close by.

When guests have some time on their hands they can make use of the onsite facilities. For those driving themselves, parking is provided on site.

There's never a dull moment at this hotel, our guests indicate that the facilities are excellent. This hotel is particularly popular with those traveling with families.

Day 4 | Evening

If you want to explore other popular attractions later, Genting World Hotel is a suitable place for you to stay and refresh.

Day 7 | Morning

Zhangjiakoubao Sceneic Area

Opening Hours: Open all day

Ticket Price: Free

Recommended Length of Stay: 1.0-2.0 Hours

Location: Intersection of Xijiao Road and Madaodi Street, Qiaoxi District, Zhangjiakou CityIntersection of Xijiao Road and Madaodi Street, Qiaoxi District, Zhangjiakou City

Zhangjiakou Fort is commonly known as Baozili, also known as Xiabao. It is the birthplace of the urban area of Zhangjiakou, the mother of Zhangjiakou, and the historical witness of the gradual growth and prosperity of Zhangyuan after 580 years of vicissitudes. Zhangjiakou Fort was built in the fourth year of Xuande in the Ming Dynasty (AD 1429). It was originally a military fortress that was simply stationed in troops. It was an important part of the defense system of Xuanfu on the nine sides of the Great Wall in the Ming Dynasty, because it was never lost during the war. Therefore, it is known as the "Wucheng" in Northern Xinjiang. With the implementation of the policy of opening borders during the Longqing Peace Conference in the Ming Dynasty, Zhangjiakou was turned into a Mongolian and Han market place. - Zhangku Commercial Road, also known as the northern land commercial port for its important position as a trade distribution center. Because of Zhangjiakou Fort's complete defense system, many tycoons and tycoons bought houses, opened shops, and made their fortunes here. At that time, more than half of the 44 foreign banks and 42 domestic banks and banks operating in Zhangjiakou were located in Zhangjiakou Fort. The Wucheng Street in the east of the fort was named because it was close to Wucheng. Named the street market, it is the node of the Shang culture and Wu culture in the border town. The current Zhangjiakou Fort still completely preserves the architectural pattern of ten streets and ten lanes formed in the late Qing Dynasty and the early Republic of China. There are 478 ancient courtyards in the Ming and Qing Dynasties. After a series of protective development, it has been used as a tourist attraction. The scenic spots that can be visited include Wenchang Pavilion. , Yuhuang Pavilion, Xiaobeimen, temples, Huancai Academy, Ding General's House, Chahar Provincial Department of Finance, Li Yuxi House, Chang Wanda House, etc.

Day 8 | Afternoon

Having the chance to enjoy the charming Xuanhua People's Park (East Gate), Qingyuan Building next to it is another great place that you will never want to miss!

Qingyuan Building

Recommended Length of Stay: 1-2 Hours

Location: Zhonglou Street, Xuanhua District, Zhangjiakou City

Qingyuan Building is located in the middle of the ancient city of Xuanhua. Qingyuan Tower, also known as Bell Tower, was built in AD 1482 in the eighteenth year of Chenghua in the Ming Dynasty. The building is built on an 8-meter-high cross coupon hole, with Changping in the south, Guangling in the north, Anding in the east, and Daxin in the west. It forms an axis with the Town Shuo Building and Arch Pole Building in the city. The iron wheel ruts from 500 years ago in the coupon cave are clearly visible. The building has 3 floors on the outside and solid floor on the inside, with a total height of 25 meters and a pavilion height of 17 meters. It consists of 3 bays and 6 tower rafters. The upper enamel is green glazed tile roof, and the waist and lower enamel are cloth tile roofs. The beam frame bucket arch is exquisite and beautiful, flying around the corner, full of vitality. The upper floor is lined down, and the hanging wish is 4 pieces. The south is called Qingyuan Building, the north is called Shengtongtianying, the east is called Zhanzhi Yanjiang, and the west is called Zhenjingbian atmosphere. Inside the building hangs a bell of Xuanfu Town, cast in the eighteenth year of Jiajing in the Ming Dynasty, with a height of 5 meters, a diameter of 7 meters, and a weight of about 10,000 catties. The bells are melodious and loud, and can be transmitted for more than 40 miles, which is quite famous. The building is unique in shape and exquisite in structure. It can be as beautiful as the Yellow Crane Tower in Wuhan, which is rare in China and is known as the "Second Yellow Crane Tower". Qingyuan Tower has experienced vicissitudes of life and suffered serious damage during the "Cultural Revolution". In 1986, the Ministry of Culture presided over the comprehensive restoration of Qingyuan Tower. The restored Qingyuan Building has blue tiles and blue tiles with crystal clear, golden dragons and beasts proud of the sky, flying enamels and horns, majestic and majestic. , elegant, majestic and spectacular. The two iron wheel ruts intertwined in the coupon cave 500 years ago are clearly visible, and you can imagine the scene of the chariots and horses, the sound of whips and the lush city scenery. Like a historical old man, from its birth to the present, the vicissitudes of more than 500 years are treasured in its memory. In 1988, Qingyuan Building was listed as a national key cultural relics protection unit.
